main.name: Ajeya Mantri
main.description: I'm a final-year undergraduate student at the National University of Singapore, looking to embark on a career in software development
main.bio: I am endlessly curious and always seeking out opportunities to learn and experience new things, while also building on pre-existing skills and knowledge. I possess a balanced and diverse range of technical and interpersonal skills, acquired through involvement in a number of carefully considered opportunities. I am experienced across various domains and my interests beyond graduation (June 2022) lie in tech-related roles: software development, mobile app development, and tech consultancy. Outside of work and academics, I am an avid watcher of movies and TV shows, and a passionate fan of football and F1. If you wish to connect with me, feel free to reach out, preferably via email or LinkedIn.
main.contactmessage: If you wish to learn more, feel free to reach out using any of the links below. For the most prompt response, message me on Whatsapp and Telegram!

resume.skillmessage: I possess a balanced and diverse range of technical and interpersonal skills, acquired through involvement in a number of carefully considered opportunities

education.degree: Bachelors of Engineering (Mechanical Engineering) with Minor in Computer Science
education.cap: Cumulative GPA: 4.66/5.00 (Expected to graduate with First Class Honours)
education.coursework: Relevant Coursework: Programming Foundations, Object-Oriented Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms, Interaction Design, Principles of Software Design
education.specialprogram1: Enrolled in the University Scholars Programme (USP), a prestigious and highly selective (3% acceptance rate) multi-disciplinary program that hones critical thinking and shapes independent, adaptable thinkers and doers
education.specialprogram1honour: Placed on the USP Honour Roll in 2019, awarded to the top 15% of each batch for academic excellence, and active engagement and contributions to the community
education.specialprogram2: Participated in the NUS Overseas Colleges (NOC) Program, a year-long immersive entrepreneurial program in which students complete internships at start-ups and undertake experiential entrepreneurial coursework
education.specialprogram2honour: Won the NOC Venture Initiation Program $10K Grant to further develop our start-up idea, beating out more than 25 other teams in the NOC program

education.cap: Scored 40/45, with perfect scores in Chemistry and Business Management

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description1: Developed front-end features and UI of a mobile application using Java, Kotlin and Android Development SDK, to expand client user base (~ 100K users) by 25%
work.description2: Implemented APIs to integrate a marketplace feature and a questionnaire-based recommendation system into a convenient interface, with aim of increasing user engagement and product sales (~ US $40M) by 2x
work.description3: Created and Deployed highly efficient REST APIs and GraphQL Queries to fetch, handle and update data from Shopify databases and internal backend servers to reduce loading time and provide a seamless user experience on the app
work.description4: Collaborated with a team of 20 including project managers, UI/UX designers, and back-end developers, using the Agile Methodology, to deliver a rigorously tested application 2 months ahead of schedule

work.title: Product Development Intern (Software)
work.description1: Led front-end development of a cross-platform mobile application using Flutter, taking the app from concept to market in <6 months, helping the company land their first set of 3 large scale trials
work.description2: Integrated hardware wearable device to the app using BLE protocols and a custom-designed SDK, enabling more intuitive data visualization and continuous monitoring by clinicians, leading to improved recovery outcomes
work.description3: Involved in projects relating to hardware and firmware development, quality management and software hiring

work.title: Engineering Intern
work.description1: Authored a white paper on “TV White Space Technologies” based on intensive market research, to provide solutions for the company to diversify from the rural industry to more profitable industrial markets.
work.description2: Used Solid Edge, a CAD software to render 3D models of the company’s products, simplifying further development.
work.description3: Processed several financial transactions and statements to enable overdue reimbursement of capital awarded through a government grant.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: A custom website created using ReactJs, HTML5 and CSS, to provide a more detailed and holistic overview of my professional experience and personal projects

projects.title: Form Builder App
projects.description: A web application built using Javascript, HTML5 and CSS, which can be used to create multi-field forms, with auto-validation for various user inputs

projects.title: Filters Project
projects.description: Simple web app built using Javascript, HTML5 and CSS, which allows users to upload a photo and try out a range of filters on it including grayscale, RGB hues and negative.

projects.title: Songbird Website
projects.description: A website built using Wix to showcase our start-up idea for a musical instrument self-learning platform. Received over 500 views within a month, and 10% of visitors signed up to be our beta testers

eca.title: Finance Secretary (Welfare)
eca.description1: Member of the finance committee responsible for budgeting, tracking and processing expenditure on student and staff welfare in USP.
eca.description2: Created and disseminated several infographics and guides to educate the student body on relevant financial procedures and regulations.

eca.title: Director (2021), Stage Manager (2020)
eca.description1: Participated in USP's annual theatre production, first as a technical stage manager and subsequently took on the responsibilities of director.
eca.description2: Spearheaded the production by setting creative direction of the production and overseeing a team of 50 cast and crew members across 11 committees.

eca.title: Vice-Chief Orientation Group Leader
eca.description1: Collaborated with the planning committees and other house committees to organize and oversee orientation activities for incoming freshmen.
eca.description2: Led a team of 15 orientation group leaders to ensure orientation activities were carried out in a meaningful, informative and safe manner.

eca.title: Operations Member and Safety Officer
eca.description1: Planned and implemented the construction of water filtration systems in two schools in Prey-Veng, Cambodia.
eca.description2: Drafted and enforced the safety-related standard operating procedures to ensure an injury-free expedition.

volunteering.title: Junior Counsellor
volunteering.description1: A not-for-profit organization dedicated to supporting and teaching valuable life skills at-risk secondary school youth in Singapore.
volunteering.description2: Volunteered as a Junior Counsellor/ Facilitator for several camps- ranging from a single day to four-day camps.

volunteering.title: Facilitator
volunteering.description1: Volunteering program involved with mentoring children with Autism and helping them learn and practice important life-skills.
volunteering.description2: Helped my mentee improve his motor skills by playing various sports, and improve his social skills through activities and games.

volunteering.title: Mentor
volunteering.description1: A student-led initiative that provides free tuition and mentorship to secondary school students from underprivileged families
volunteering.description2: Tutored my secondary school mentee in Mathematics and Science, to help him prepare for his tests and assignments.
volunteering.description3: Arranged activities such as museum visits and science experiments to help my mentee learn beyond the classroom

volunteering.title: Mentor
volunteering.description1: An initiative that aims to provide children from underprivileged background effective written communication skills.
volunteering.description2: Conducted lessons on effective writing and creative writing for a class of secondary school students.

volunteering.title: Volunteer
volunteering.description1: Helped to organize weekly interaction sessions involving music performances, dancing and simple games for the patients to partake in.
volunteering.description2: Assisted in planning and conducting the Christmas celebration for the patients.
